an3.46:4.1: “Mendicants, when ethical renunciants are supported by a town or village,
an3.46:4.2: the people there make much merit in three ways.
an3.46:4.4: By way of body, speech, and mind.
an3.46:4.5: When ethical renunciants are supported by a town or village,
an3.46:4.6: the people there make much merit in these three ways.”
